These plants are typically succulent, with fleshy leaves and stems that help them store water, allowing them to thrive in arid environments. Etiosedum species produce small, star-shaped flowers in a variety of colors, including white, pink, and purple. The genus includes over 200 species, many of which are popular for their ornamental value and ease of cultivation.
